column1: #Text=Polycrystalline HgMn7O12 was prepared by solid-state reaction under high-pressure and high-temperature conditions.
#Text=Stoichiometric amounts of HgO (Sigma-Aldrich  99.0%), MnO2 (Alfa Aesar 99.997%), and Mn2O3 (Aldrich 99.99%) were well mixed and sealed in a platinum capsule.
#Text=The capsule, a boron nitrite insulating layer, and a graphite heater were assembled in a pyrophyllite cell and placed in a DIA-type cubic anvil high-pressure apparatus.
#Text=The sample was treated at 8 GPa and 1600 K for 30 min and then released to ambient condition.
#Text=Judging by x-ray powder diffraction and magnetic susceptibility (see Supplementary Material (SM) [20], Fig.
#Text=S1), products from 14 out of the 24 runs were selected and combined for further analysis in the neutron powder diffraction (NPD) studies.
